thread.title: World News Update, What you need to know
thread.title_full: World News Update, What you need to know

title: World News Update, What you need to know
text:
Tue, Sep 22, 2015, 8:28 AM AEST - Australia Markets open in 1 hr 32 mins World News Update, What you need to know AAP â€“ 43 minutes ago 
Hackers have infiltrated the vaunted Apple ecosystem by injecting malicious software into popular Chinese mobile apps, potentially affecting hundreds of millions of users. 
ELSEWHERE: 
LONDON - A new biography of David Cameron by a former ally turned political enemy contains claims of youthful debauchery by the future British leader, according to extracts published by the Daily Mail. 
NEW YORK - The brash Republican frontrunner for president, Donald Trump, will publish a new book next month on how America can be restored to greatness. 
LONDON - For those who want to grow old disgracefully, it could be good (sex) news. 
PARIS - France's data protection watchdog has rejected an appeal by Google against a decision ordering the internet giant to comply with users' requests to have information about them removed from all search results. 
LONDON - Britain's Prince William and his brother Prince Harry will be supporting opposing teams when England face Wales in a key World Cup match at Twickenham on Saturday. 
BERLIN - German prosecutors have charged a 91-year-old woman with 260,000 counts of accessory to murder on allegations she was a member of the Nazi SS who served in the Auschwitz death camp complex. 
LONDON - An "old" drug used to treat rheumatoid arthritis may offer new hope in the fight against Alzheimer's and other forms of dementia, scientists say. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook
